memberdef.argsstring: (struct gl_renderer *gr, EGLint egl_surface_type, const uint32_t *drm_formats, unsigned drm_formats_count)
memberdef.name: gl_renderer_get_egl_config

detaileddescription.para: independent of EGL display), loads the function pointers, and checks if the platform is supported.

gr
The OpenGL renderer
0 for success, -1 if platform is unsupported
This function checks whether a specific platform_* extension is supported by EGL by checking in order "EGL_KHR_platform_foo", "EGL_EXT_platform_foo", and "EGL_MESA_platform_foo" in order, for some platform "foo".
